forticlient-disconnect-unsupported-clien.help: Enable/disable disconnecting of unsupported FortiClient endpoints.
forticlient-disconnect-unsupported-clien.name: forticlient-disconnect-unsupported-client

options.help: Enable disconnection of clients on unsupported routes.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable disconnection of clients on unsupported routes.
options.name: disable

forticlient-keepalive-interval.help: Interval between two KeepAlive messages from FortiClient (20 - 300 sec, default = 60).
forticlient-keepalive-interval.name: forticlient-keepalive-interval

forticlient-sys-update-interval.help: Interval between two system update messages from FortiClient (30 - 1440 min, default = 720).
forticlient-sys-update-interval.name: forticlient-sys-update-interval
